text:
TIVERTON -- Tiverton High School conducted its annual Awards Night online on
Wednesday, May 27, for the Class of 2020.

The following students received awards.

SPECIAL AWARDS

Stephen Murray Memorial Scholarship: Hannah Marley and Chad Carreiro

Aspiring Educator Award: Sarah Downey, Hannah Marley, Peyton Rego, Amy Lynn
Casey

URI Think Big Scholarship: Lauren Bowdren

Michael McCarthy Memorial Scholarship: Hannah Marley, Abbigail Poland, Jacob
Levesque, Jillian DaSilva

Megan Cordeiro Memorial Scholarship: Hannah Marley, Brenna Nobrega

Conrad Beaulieu Memorial Scholarship: Marisa Cayer, Abbie Chase, Samuel Costa,
Jillian DaSilva, Hannah de Melo, Sarah Downey, Abigail Forcier, Jack Paradis,
Mackenzie Pelletier, Abbigail Poland

Tiverton Athletic Boosters Scholarships: Samuel Costa, Matthew Gacioch,
Abbigail Poland, Giavanna Mattera

Nora Wood Moore Scholarship: Abigail Forcier

Diana Cruz Memorial Scholarship: Cherilyn DeFreitas

Paul Downey Memorial Scholarship: Harshil Patel

Stone Bridge Volunteer Fire Dept. Scholarships: Aaron Case, Amy Lynn Casey,
Abbie Chase, Alyssa Laquerre, Madison McKenna, Brenna Nobrega, Matthew
Parella, Mackenzie Pelletier, Morgan Raposa, Jaimi Vaillancourt, Lauran Wilson

Guidance Scholarship for Most Industrious Spirit: Lauren Bowdren, Emily
Caraveo, Hannah de Melo, Maree Feld, Emma Franklin, Kayley Nagle, Hannah
Nasiff, Abbigail Poland, Mikaela Rielly, Asha Taber

State Senate Recognition: Hannah de Melo, Sarah Downey, Jillian DaSilva,
Abigail Forcier, Kate Marshall, Harshil Patel, Mackenzie Pelletier, Abbigail
Poland, Michelle Umehara, Riko Weidman

State House of Representatives Recognition: Hannah de Melo, Sarah Downey,
Jillian DaSilva, Abigail Forcier, Kate Marshall, Harshil Patel, Mackenzie
Pelletier, Abbigail Poland, Michelle Umehara, Riko Weidman

Tiverton Prevention Coalition \- Dr. William White Scholarship: Ava Erickson

David S. Frerichs Jr. Memorial Scholarship: Sarah Downey

NEA/Tiverton Scholarship: Jillian DaSilva, Sarah Downey, Abigail Forcier,
Harshil Patel, Abbigail Poland

Jean Ford Memorial Scholarship: Matthew Gacioch

David N. Cicilline Congressional Leadership Award: Abigail Forcier

Rensselaer Polytech Institute Certificate (Junior Student): Jameson Peckham

Student Council: William Goodman Scholarship: Emily Caraveo

Student Council: Best Overall Student Council Members: Abbigail Poland and
Abigail Forcier

Student Council: Most School Spirited: Cherilyn DeFreitas

Student Council: Carolyn St. Michel Memorial Scholarship: Brenna Nobrega

Student Council Membership Awards: Lauren Bowdren, Emily Caraveo, Marisa
Cayer, Jillian DaSilva, Hannah de Melo, Cherilyn DeFreitas, Ava Erickson,
Abigail Forcier, Brenna Nobrega, Mackenzie Pelletier, Abbigail Poland, Camden
Pyne

St. Anne's Credit Union: Hannah de Melo

TLL Pesky Scholarship: Matthew Gacioch, Giavanna Mattera, Joshua Farias,
Abbigail Poland, Jaimi Vaillancourt

Westport River Watershed Scholarship: Jillian DaSilva

Women's Club of Newport County: Marisa Cayer, Elexxia Fournier

RI Honor Society: Alexis Andrade, Kaliyah Awer, Lauren Bowdren, Kerri Breen,
Aja Caldwell, Emily Caraveo, Aaron Case, Amy Lynn Casey, Marisa Cayer, Abbie
Chase, Cora Chouinard, Ethan Costa, Matthew Costa, Samuel Costa, Jillian
DaSilva, Hannah de Melo, Cherilyn DeFreitas, Sarah Downey, Nicholas Ekstrom,
Joshua Farias, Maree Feld, Chloe Fernandes, Abigail Forcier, Elexxia Fournier,
Emma Franklin, Matthew Gacioch, Pietro Galiotti, Caleb Grindstaff, Dillon
Guerrera, Charlotte Guillemette, Chloe Higginbottom, Alyssa Laquerre, Michael
Levakis, Chase Lewis, Rylie Maitland, Alexis Marinelli, Hannah Marley, Kate
Marshall, Ryan McCormack, Madison McKenna, Maisie McQueen, Cameron Michaels,
Lindsey Monast, Isabel Munroe, Caesar Nafrada, Kayley Nagle, Hannah Nasiff,
Luke Nasiff, Nathaniel Neville, Brenna Nobrega, Ryan Oliveira, Jack Paradis,
Matthew Parella, Harshil Patel, Mackenzie Pelletier, Abbigail Poland, Camden
Pyne, Lauren Ramos, Morgan Raposa, Mikaela Rielly, Ceindrech Snigger, Asha
Taber, Michelle Umehara, Nathan Upchurch, Jaimi Vaillancourt, Julia Vieira,
Riko Weidman, Lauran Wilson

Valedictorian: Hannah de Melo

Salutatorian: Sarah Downey

Springfield College Book Award: Chana Urrego

Sage Colleges Award: Gwyneth Hallman, Emma Beaudoin

URI Book Award: Mariah Ramos

Community Service Awards: Sarah Downey 320 hours, Aja Caldwell 227 hours,
Matthew Gacioch 205 hours, Ava Erickson 202 hours, Kayley Nagle 200 hours,
Asha Taber 183 hours, Michelle Umehara 184 hours, Lauran Wilson 176 hours,
Emily Caraveo 168 hours, Alexis Andrade 161 hours, Ethan Costa 158 hours,
Hannah de Melo 158 hours, Lindsey Monast 151 hours, Maree Feld 150 hours

Outstanding Health/Physical Education Students: Amy Lynn Casey, Ryan McCormack

Peer Helping Network: Traven Andrews, Micah Angell, Kerri Breen, Emily
Caraveo, Jillian DaSilva, Ava Erickson, Rylie Maitland, Hannah Marley,
Mackenzie Pelletier

Outstanding Art Student: Giavanna Mattera, Emily Caraveo

Outstanding Business Student: Jameson Peckham

Outstandint Technology Education Students: Matthew Gacioch, Morgan Raposa

Outstanding Culinary Student: Alyssa Laquerre and Ana Julia DeSouza

Future Business Leaders of America: Caesar Nafrada

Universary of Rochester-Xerox Award: Cole Cirillo

Outstanding Junior English Student: Aubrey McConnell

Outstanding Senior English Student: Michelle Umehara

Outstanding Math Student: Hannah de Melo

Chief Gunner's Mate Thomas Eadie Award: Michelle Umehara

American Mathematical Society Award: Sarah Downey

Outstanding Science Student: Abigail Forcier

Outstnding Science Student in the Study of Biology: Hannah de Melo

Outstnding Science Student in the Study of Chemistry: Jillian DaSilva

Outstnding Science Student in the Study of Physics: Abbigail Poland

Bausch and Lomb Science Award (Junior Student): Jameson Peckham

Chief Petty Officer Francis Edward Ormsbee Jr. Award: Chase Lewis

Outstanding Social Studies Student: Jillian DaSilva and Ethan Costa

Frederick Douglass and Susan B. Anthony Award in Humanities and Social
Sciences Award (Junior Student): Kaylee Martins

Herbert and Claiborne Pell History Medal: Angelin Santerre

Outstanding World Language Student in the Study of Portuguese: Elexxia
Fournier

Outstanding World Language Student in the Study of Spanish: Michelle Umehara

Hector S. Levesque Memorial Award: Sarah Downey

The University of Rochester's George Eastman Young Leaders Award (Junior
Student): Caiden Ibbotson

St. Michael's College Book Award: Julia Farias, Owen Klusak

RI General Treasurer Seth Magaziner Young Leader Award: Fredisvindo Bebe

title: Tiverton High School's Class of 2020 receives accolades on Awards Night
